channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA

item.title: Report E-2024080564
item.description:
Report E-2024080564

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-26T06:17:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-22
  • City: DES MOINES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 10500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 0.5-gallons of Bi-Dash 2E released impacting the trailer floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and dispatched Clean Harbors to assist with the clean up. Clean Harbors arrived onsite and advised a total of 15-gallons of product released. Clean Harbors deployed absorbents and cleaned the impacted areas. Clean Harbors containerized 84 plastic jugs for disposal.
